description: This template represents a generic question with categorical values as answers.

categorical_item.description: If categorical values are on a scale, use scale_item instead of categorical_item as name.

answer.description: Enumerate the code/text pairs inside the enum array: for example 'code': 1, 'text': 'not useful'

date_time.description: Create one property for each of the question-level timestamp you need: for ex., start_date_time, end_date_time
